name: Going Viral (BunnyChamber, CertifiablyInsane, coloredasterisk)
description:
This hunky antivirus has been tasked with eliminating the multitude of mischievous viruses within this PC. Break open pieces of the motherboard and repair them with correct timing to ensnare the viruses such that they never return. 

Created for the Games Den Quicker Game Jam 2022! Theme: Restore

André Beaulieu - Level Design, Programmer

Jimmy Xu- Programmer , User Interface & Gameplay Designer

Jason Cabuenos - Game Design , Game Art, Sound Design, Music

Version 3 (Latest)

- Game starts at title screen

- Level progression fixed

- Lives and scoring fixed
